title: Thai green curry
description: Jo Pratt blends authentic ingredients into a quick homemade paste that forms the base of her Thai green chicken curry.
ingredients: 2 tbsp  Thai green curry paste (according to taste)
1-2 thick stalks lemongrass, fat ends bashed with a rolling pin (optional)
750g/1½lb skinless, boneless chicken, cut into chunks (use breast and/or leg meat)
6-8 kaffir lime leaves, torn into pieces (if unavailable, use the grated zest of 1 lime)
Good shake of Thai fish sauce or light soy sauce
Small handful of coriander, roughly chopped
